attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "[datastax] 
name = DataStax Repo for Apache Cassandra
baseurl = http://rpm.datastax.com/community
enabled = 1
gpgcheck = 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.repos.d/datastax.repo
sudo yum install -y dsc30
sudo yum install -y cassandra30-tools

#!/bin/bash
sudo yum install firewalld -y 
sudo systemctl disable firewalld
sudo systemctl stop firewalld
sudo service cassandra stop
rm -rf /var/lib/cassandra/data/system/*
sudo sed -i 's/cluster_name: \x27Test Cluster\x27/cluster_name: \x27@@{CLUSTER_NAME}@@\x27/' /etc/cassandra/conf/cassandra.yaml
sudo sed -i 's#- seeds: "127.0.0.1"#- seeds: "@@{calm_array_address}@@"#' /etc/cassandra/conf/cassandra.yaml
sudo sed -i 's/listen_address: localhost/listen_address: @@{address}@@/' /etc/cassandra/conf/cassandra.yaml
sudo sed -i 's/rpc_address: localhost/rpc_address: \x27127.0.0.1\x27/' /etc/cassandra/conf/cassandra.yaml
sudo sed -i 's/endpoint_snitch: SimpleSnitch/endpoint_snitch: GossipingPropertyFileSnitch/' /etc/cassandra/conf/cassandra.yaml
sudo sed -i 's#/var/lib/cassandra/data#@@{DATA_PATH}@@#' /etc/cassandra/conf/cassandra.yaml

echo "auto_bootstrap: true" | sudo tee -a /etc/cassandra/conf/cassandra.yaml
sudo service cassandra start

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y wget
sudo wget https://mirror.its.sfu.ca/mirror/CentOS-Third-Party/NSG/common/x86_64/jdk-8u60-linux-x64.rpm
sudo yum localinstall -y jdk-8u60-linux-x64.rpm
echo "Uninstalling"

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex
sudo mkdir -p /var/lib/cassandra
sudo yum install -y lvm2
sudo pvcreate /dev/xvdb
sudo vgcreate cassandra_vg /dev/xvdb
sleep 3
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n cassandra_lvm cassandra_vg
sudo mkfs.xfs /dev/cassandra_vg/cassandra_lvm
echo -e "/dev/cassandra_vg/cassandra_lvm \t /var/lib/cassandra \t xfs \t defaults \t 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a

sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y wget
sudo wget https://mirror.its.sfu.ca/mirror/CentOS-Third-Party/NSG/common/x86_64/jdk-8u60-linux-x64.rpm
sudo yum localinstall -y jdk-8u60-linux-x64.rpm
echo "Uninstalling package"

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "[datastax] 
name = DataStax Repo for Apache Cassandra
baseurl = http://rpm.datastax.com/community
enabled = 1
gpgcheck = 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.repos.d/datastax.repo
sudo yum install -y dsc30
sudo yum install -y cassandra30-tools

#!/bin/bash
sudo yum install firewalld -y 
sudo systemctl disable firewalld
sudo systemctl stop firewalld
sudo service cassandra stop
rm -rf /var/lib/cassandra/data/system/*
sudo sed -i 's/cluster_name: \x27Test Cluster\x27/cluster_name: \x27@@{CLUSTER_NAME}@@\x27/' /etc/cassandra/conf/cassandra.yaml
sudo sed -i 's#- seeds: "127.0.0.1"#- seeds: "@@{calm_array_address}@@"#' /etc/cassandra/conf/cassandra.yaml
sudo sed -i 's/listen_address: localhost/listen_address: @@{address}@@/' /etc/cassandra/conf/cassandra.yaml
sudo sed -i 's/rpc_address: localhost/rpc_address: \x27127.0.0.1\x27/' /etc/cassandra/conf/cassandra.yaml
sudo sed -i 's/endpoint_snitch: SimpleSnitch/endpoint_snitch: GossipingPropertyFileSnitch/' /etc/cassandra/conf/cassandra.yaml
sudo sed -i 's#/var/lib/cassandra/data#@@{DATA_PATH}@@#' /etc/cassandra/conf/cassandra.yaml

echo "auto_bootstrap: true" | sudo tee -a /etc/cassandra/conf/cassandra.yaml
sudo service cassandra start

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

guest_customization.cloud_init:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

action_list.description: This action will scale in Cassandra instances by given scale in count
action_list.name: ScaleIn

attrs.script:
sudo sed -i 's/- seeds:.*$/- seeds: \"@@{calm_array_address}@@\"/g' /etc/cassandra/conf/cassandra.yaml
sudo service cassandra stop
sudo service cassandra start

action_list.description: This action will scale out Cassandra instances by given scale out count
action_list.name: ScaleOut

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y wget
sudo wget https://mirror.its.sfu.ca/mirror/CentOS-Third-Party/NSG/common/x86_64/jdk-8u60-linux-x64.rpm
sudo yum localinstall -y jdk-8u60-linux-x64.rpm
echo "Uninstalling"

#!/bin/bash
set -ex
sudo mkdir -p /var/lib/cassandra
sudo yum install -y lvm2
sudo pvcreate /dev/xvdb
sudo vgcreate cassandra_vg /dev/xvdb
sleep 3
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n cassandra_lvm cassandra_vg
sudo mkfs.xfs /dev/cassandra_vg/cassandra_lvm
echo -e "/dev/cassandra_vg/cassandra_lvm \t /var/lib/cassandra \t xfs \t defaults \t 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a

sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y wget
sudo wget https://mirror.its.sfu.ca/mirror/CentOS-Third-Party/NSG/common/x86_64/jdk-8u60-linux-x64.rpm
sudo yum localinstall -y jdk-8u60-linux-x64.rpm
echo "Uninstalling package"

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo mkdir -p /var/lib/cassandra
sudo yum install -y lvm2
sudo pvcreate /dev/sdb
sudo vgcreate cassandra_vg /dev/sdb
sleep 3
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n cassandra_lvm cassandra_vg
sudo mkfs.xfs /dev/cassandra_vg/cassandra_lvm
echo -e "/dev/cassandra_vg/cassandra_lvm \t /var/lib/cassandra \t xfs \t defaults \t 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a

sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y wget
sudo wget https://mirror.its.sfu.ca/mirror/CentOS-Third-Party/NSG/common/x86_64/jdk-8u60-linux-x64.rpm
sudo yum localinstall -y jdk-8u60-linux-x64.rpm
